ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.5'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Set of tools to facilitate package development and make R a more user-friendly place. Mostly for developers (or anyone who writes/shares functions). Provides a simple, powerful and flexible way to check the arguments passed to functions. The developer can easily describe the type of argument needed. If the user provides a wrong argument, then an informative error message is prompted with the requested type and the problem clearly stated--saving the user a lot of time in debugging.

Set of tools to facilitate package development and make R a more user-friendly place. Mostly for developers (or anyone who writes/shares functions). Provides a simple, powerful and flexible way to check the arguments passed to functions. The developer can easily describe the type of argument needed. If the user provides a wrong argument, then an informative error message is prompted with the requested type and the problem clearly stated--saving the user a lot of time in debugging.

name: r-dreamerr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.5.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-dreamerr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/dreamerr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/dreamerr/dreamerr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 590b609009bac8d04ad363b0c067806f5c13870aaef2b42aa8764f74e2040178

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-formula
    - r-stringmagic
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-formula
    - r-stringmagic

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('dreamerr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('dreamerr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=dreamerr
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Set of tools to facilitate package development and make R a more user-friendly place. Mostly for developers (or anyone who writes/shares functions). Provides a simple, powerful and flexible way to check the arguments passed to functions. The developer can easily describe the type of argument needed. If the user
    provides a wrong argument, then an informative error message is prompted with the requested type and the problem clearly stated--saving the user a lot of time in debugging.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
